com.googlecode.aluminumproject.parsers.aluscript.instructions

Interface Instruction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInstruction, ActionInstruction, ExpressionInstruction, LibraryInstruction, NewlineInstruction, TabInstruction, TextInstruction

    public interface Instruction
    An instruction for the AluScript parser. It allows a number of parameters and modifies the context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(Map<String,String> parameters, AluScriptContext context)
      Executes this instruction in a certain context.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this instruction.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this instruction.
        Returns:
        this instruction's name

      • execute

        void execute(Map<String,String> parameters,
           AluScriptContext context)
             throws AluminumException
        Executes this instruction in a certain context.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters of this instruction (may be empty, but not null)
        context - the context to use
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when something goes wrong while executing this instruction
